Redweasel, good luck today. Thank you robink, Redweasel and wishiwere. Your help is invaluable to me. I feel like I am walking through a dark forest going "Huh, what??"

Posts.Title: Breast Surgeon Appt. This Friday Tetonview Tetonview

Posts.Content: May 14, 2008 02:39PM Tetonview wrote: I am a little late updating but wanted to follow through. I did see the Breast Surgeon. He has scheduled me for several ultrasounds this Friday. We will go from there, review the results, and he may do some biopsies right there (using the ultrasound), he may schedule an MRI or he may say they are all cystic lumps and get out of here. That would be the best option. He found more lumps under my arm, on my chest, and on the right breast. I think there are too many to be any thing to worry about. Sure hope I am right! I will update again. Thanks for your help.
